note.p: Education: Eton College; Inner Temple (admitted 1692); King's College, Cambridge (matriculated 1700); Middle Temple (admitted 1706)
Career: Called to the Bar (1704); Prothonotary of the Court of Common Pleas
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Venn; IT; MT
References: Obituaries in 'Gentleman's Magazine' 1761, p382; 'London Magazine' 1761, p448
